Title: Assault: The Endless Swarm
Description:
The mantid swarm is surging! There's no way the Golden Lotus will be able to handle this many of them.

We must do something to drive them back!
ObjectivesText: Drive back the Mantid Assault in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
AreaDescription: Return to Taoshi at the Silent Sanctuary.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Taoshi at the Silent Sanctuary.
